column1: Local Foods////I ordered the crunchy chicken sandwich.  Omg
column2: so good!! Shared some with Mimi (my shih tzu)
column3: she definately approves! My bf had their roast beef sandwich. They are generous with their meat! Their sandwiches come with a choice of two sides or soup. I had the olive salad and quinoa
column4: yum! My bf had the one of their soups.  Definately will return to try their other selections! !
